Detailed Description

template<class BitmapIterator, class Kernel>
class iipr::TLocalNeighborhood< BitmapIterator, Kernel >

Implementation of local neighborhood in a bitmap.

Instance of this object is initialized with the some position in a bitmap (represented as a bitmap iterator) and some kernel. Begin() and End() functions returns the boundary iterator for moving through the local neighborhood and accessing to the pixel values.
